location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, to Lieutenant Colonel Macdonald, Envoy to the Court of Persia

mods.abstract: Forwards translations of letters received from His Royal Highness the Prince of Shiraz, Mahomed Zakee Khan [Muḥammad Zakī Khān] and Mirza Ali Akbar [Mīrzā ‘Alī Akbār] on the subjects of the seizure of the ship Nassreh Shah[Nāṣirah Shāh?] and hostile demonstrations of the Imam of Muscat against the Government of Bushire.Enclosures:'Translation of a Rukum [ ruqum] from the Prince of Shiraz to Colonel Stannus C.B. - dated Zelhaj received 9 August 1826' (ff. 7-8)'Translation of a Letter from Zaqee Khan Prime Minister of Fars to Colonel Stannus, no date - received 9 August 1826' (ff 8v-11)'Translation of a Letter from Ally Akbar agents at Shiraz to Colonel Stannus dated 28 Zelhaj or 3 August 1826' (ff. 11-12v)
